pageContent: Objective: To assess clinical safety (primary) and efficacy (secondary) of histotripsy for treatment of symptomatic benign prostatic enlargement in a first-in human study.

metaData.source:
[First-line therapy for low-risk prostate cancer: prospective phase II study of focal therapy (hemiablation) of the prostate with high intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) in patients suitable for "Active Surveillance" (AP 68/11 of the AUO)]
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/24556711/
